```mermaid
flowchart LR
    A[Offer of HIIT<br/>as part of DSMP] --> B[Initial choice]

    B --> C1[Chooses HIIT<br/>Participant]
    B --> C2[Does not choose HIIT<br/>Nonparticipant]

    C1 --> D[During DSMP<br/>Bodily, social, and practical experiences]
    C2 --> D

    D --> E[End of DSMP<br/>Re-evaluation of exercise]

    E --> F[Everyday life after programme<br/>Integration, adaptation, or disengagement]
